author: jsalfeld
body:
#### PR description:

in #31962 it was pointed out to move to the esConsumes style. A problem was encountered, but fixed in #32217, now merged into 11.2.0_pre10.

This PR changes to esConsumes.

#### PR validation:

I checked the suggested implementation to produce the expected output.
title: changing to esConsumes after fix in  #32217
